{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Buffalo WZR-900DHP.jpg |image1_size = 75px |caption = Buffalo AirStation N900 Gigabit DualBand Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.buffalo.jp/product/detail/wzr-900dhp.html |ppalt = (JP) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Buffalo_WZR-900DHP |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Buffalo |model = WZR-900D |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HP |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = FDI000000014 |icid = 6102A-049 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM47081A0;BCM47081A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Zentel;A5U1GA31ATS-BC; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646E-BCK0; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 10:6F:3F,B0:C7:45 |oui = 10:6F:3F,B0:C7:45
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz High Power Wireless LAN Power Amplifier;Skyworks (SiGe);SE2605L;;3; ,,, 5GHz 26dBm Power Amplifier With Power Detector;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5004L;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = WG9116H |manuf_rev = 33 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/14/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00BHP2R4O |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The ''[[Arcadyan]]'' model on the label appears to be [https://memo205.wordpress.com/category/router/broadcom/ WG9116H33]. :A MAC address with a 10:6F:3F OUI is also on the label. :This is presumed to be an OUI used by this device.
Additional info, per the FCC internal photos... :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM47081A0 SoC's full P/N is BCM47081A0KFEBG. :5 GHz radio: 3x [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product/970/SE5004L SE5004L] Power Amplifier Module. :2.4 GHz radio: 3x [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product/964/SE2605L SE2605L] ([http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=131895&p=irol-newsArticle&ID=1700613 SE2504L]) PAM. :All antennas shown are ''Airgain'' antennas: :N5x20B for 5GHz, N2420SS for 2.4GHz.
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=746456 Stub post on the DD-WRT forums]
==See also== *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H22 (BCM47081A0) *Buffalo WZR-900DHP • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H33 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1750DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117GAC33 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1166DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117EAC22 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-D1800H]] • [[Arcadyan]] WA9116BAC33 (BCM4706) <!-- :wzr-600dhp2 • FLA1: 128MB (Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-BC) cpu BCM47081A0 :wzr-900dhp • FLA1: 128MB (Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-BC) cpu BCM47081A0 :wzr-1750dhp • FLA1: 128MB (Zentel A5U1GA31ATS-BC) cpu BCM4708A0 :wzr-1166dhp • FLA1: 128MB (Samsung K9F1G08U0D-SCB0) cpu BCM4708A0 :wzr-d1800h • FLA1: 128MB (Samsung K9F1G08U0D-SCB0) cpu BCM4706 -->
